page.title: 14 JOBS
page.content: {Askern}is a{coal mining}village so many men are miners. However there is a lot of unemployment in the country at the moment so we expected to find some people with no{jobs.}Out of 105 men interviewed,28 men had no{jobs}and of the remaining 77, 18 were miners and 2 worked at the coalite plant. Almost all the other men had manual jobs. Three were plumbers, three painters and two lorry drivers. Out of 109 women, only 54 had { {jobs,}the most common being cleaning which 11 women did. Amongst the women there were 6 nurses but apart from that, most women did unskilled work. Three of them were shop keepers. In a mining community most women do not work. They are housewives.
